RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG HAZEL three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, inched away under a drive to prevail. ICHIBAN dueled from the three path early on before easing off a step allowing SHORT SHIFT to take sole albeit narrow command, pressed that rival through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, seized command straightened away, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, ran on to preserve the place honors. FOXY CARA coaxed from the gate, chased five then four wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, went five wide into upper stretch and kept on to secure the show honors. JESSICA'S RIDE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tipped out three to four wide at the three-sixteenths and weakened. SHORT SHIFT brushed the near side stall at the start, dueled early on with ICHIBAN to her outside while in the two path, had that rival ease back slightly and then came under pressure once more through the turn getting placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths in response, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, yielded the front straightened away and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Short Shift
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, dueled 2p early, under pressure turn, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Jessica's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tip 3-4w 3/16, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Big Hazel
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Carlson Dustin and Bernard Albert W
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, up 1/8, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Ichiban
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early 3p, pressed 3w turn, 4w uppr, up, caught 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Foxy Cara
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 1 1/8M Inner turf CR: 89. Allowance Purse 80000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLLABORATION broke a bit awkwardly then bumped lightly with the hindquarters of a foe, moved from the rail to the two path while under a snug hold on the first turn, tracked outside down the backstretch, ranged up in the two path on the far turn, took the lead inside the five-sixteenths, kicked clear under a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker and proved best under steady urging. SNOWY EVENING went two then three wide under a hold on the first turn, was rated off the pace, advanced in the three path on the far turn, made a bid outside the quarter-pole, fought with the winner under a drive in upper stretch, lost touch with that foe before the furlong marker and was outfinished while able to get the place. SALS DREAM GIRL was bumped lightly in the hindquarters at the break, saved ground on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, moved from the rail to the two path on the far turn, brushed with a foe while roused five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed kick while up for the show. RHEAUME brushed with a foe at the start, was taken under a tight hold early, tugged hard at the bit under stout restraint in the two path going around the first turn, was rated off the pace, raced inside for most of the far turn then slipped to the two path, was roused four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. RED HOT CHICK was taken back early then moved in into the first turn, raced in the two path under reserve, shifted to the three path while roused on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to rally. LADY JASMINE was taken under restraint early, tugged eagerly on the bit while four wide on the first turn, settled more kindly while given cover on the backstretch, went two then three wide on the far turn, brushed with an opponent while roused six wide into the stretch and also failed to rally. LA CONQUISTADORA brushed with a foe then was hustled from the gate, displayed good speed while three then two wide on the first turn, sped clear late on that bend, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside while shortening stride on the far turn, lost the advantage outside the quarter-pole and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Collaboration
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit awkward brk,light bump,ins-2p,tracked out,lead 1/4,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sals Dream Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bump brk,ins1st,reserved,ins-2p2nd,5p1/4,brshd,up for 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Snowy Evening
ENTRY.OWNER: Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Gleaves Philip A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3p1st,rated,ranged up 3p2nd,bid1/4,outfinished,held place

ENTRY.NAME: La Conquistadora
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2p1st,sped clear,ins2nd,headed outside 1/4,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Rheaume
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,hard held,2p1st,rated,ins-2p2nd,4w1/4,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Chick
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in into 1st,2p,reserved,ask2-3p2nd,5w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasmine
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Behrendt John T Marquis Charles K Haslup Suzanne K Carney Sean Punk
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard held 4w1st,pulled,keen,rated,2-3p2nd,6p1/4,brshd,no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CENTRAL PRIDE bobbled at the break, recovered to chased five then four wide early on, tucked three wide at the five-eighths before tucking to the two path through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied in tandem with the runner up to his outside overthrowing the leader with seventy yards to the finish and inched away in the late stages to prevail. SWAY'SINMYDNA chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, rallied in concert with the aforementioned foe to overtake the leader inside the final sixteenth offering up a mild kick to secure the place honors. WARMAN ROAD established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside through the turn and was patiently handled, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, got roused near the three-sixteenths, dug in under threat from a pair and was collared inside the final sixteenth and was along clear for the show honors. SORPRESO chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. REUNION TOUR chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun three wide into upper stretch and weakened. JUGGLER bobbled at the start, chased four then three wide growing detached at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch well behind, then got eased through the final furlong and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Sway'sinmydna
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, mild kick, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Reunion Tour
ENTRY.OWNER: Ferraro James W Barbati Kenneth B and Citarella Diana
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Sorpreso
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Juggler
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Central Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, 4-5w early, 2w turn, 3w upper, dug in, up fin 70yds

ENTRY.NAME: Warman Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, ins turn, 2w 1/4p, roused 3/16, caught final 70yds

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 1 1/16M Turf CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 95000. (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Tha n Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At Any Distance Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). ( If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Sixteenth on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PROGRAM TRADING (GB) moved up after the start, stalked the pace on the outside, turned up the pressure in the two path on the turn, gained the lead just inside the five-sixteenths, was asked between foes into the stretch, battled inside of two rivals into the final furlong then shook clear and proved best under steady urging. OPERATION TORCH was rated just off the pace on the inside, moved to the two path late on the far turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole then came four wide into the stretch, gained to make an outside bid inside the three-sixteenths, battled outside of two foes into the final furlong and was outfinished while well clear for the place. SCRAMBLE was rated just off the pace, ranged up two then three wide on the turn, made a bid at the five-sixteenths, fought with foes under a drive into the final furlong and weakened but held the show. LACHAISE dropped back early then settled on the outside, was roused while moving closer in the three path on the turn and came up empty. THUNDERIAN went to the front, showed the way on the inside while in hand, was asked on the turn, lost the lead to the winner just inside the five-sixteenths, dropped back into upper stretch and gave way. BABY BILLY was hustled from the gate, dropped back when taken in hand leaving the chute, settled off the pace, came under urging late on the backstretch, rounded the turn in the two path, paused off heels near the five-sixteenths then was roused for more and failed to respond. CLASSIC CREATION brushed the inside of the gate at the start, checked severely along the rail early then fell to the rear of the field, saved ground on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Creation
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate,checked sharply early,dropped back,ins,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Operation Torch
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,2path 5/16,roused 4w1/4,bid3/16,outfinished,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Billy
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing Rocco Steven and Branch William
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,drop back leaving chute,settled,2p turn,paused5/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Lachaise
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,settled outside,ask 3w turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Scramble
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off pace,2-3p turn,bid5/16,vied past1/8,wknd,held3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Thunderian
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace in hand,asked turn,headed ins 5/16,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Program Trading (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside,2p turn,lead ins 5/16,btwn1/4,clr ins1/8,driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 98. Claiming Purse 62000. (UP TO $10,788 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $32,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% After care Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LASTCHANCEATGLORY four wide in aim of the leader down the backstretch, tucked to the two path advancing on that rival and coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, slipped away as a pair from the rest of the field, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, took over command just inside the three-sixteenths and dug in under a drive fending off LITTLE DEMON through to the finish and gamely inched away to the end. DUST DEVIL four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly surging late to just get up for the place honors on the wire. LITTLE DEMON broke in at the start taking over the lane of PIT BOSS forcing that foe to steady in behind, showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside coming under pressure to the outside from the eventual winner and was placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive fighting on to the finish, got shaken off late and was just nailed on the wire for the place honors. TWO THIRTY FIVE got bumped at the start by CUPID'S CLAWS, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and kept on to the finish. PIT BOSS got steadied at the start when LITTLE DEMON broke inwards taking over the lane, chased six then five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered no response. CUPID'S CLAWS broke in at the start bumping TWO THIRTY FIVE, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, continued in the two path into upper stretch and made no impact. ROCCO STRONG chased five then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, tired. MY FRIENDS BEER chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, lost ground through the latter portion of the turn and went four wide into upper stretch, tired, and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Thirty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Claws
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 7/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: My Friends Beer
ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables and Acqu
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 7/16, 4w upper, tired, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Dust Devil
ENTRY.OWNER: Two B and One C Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, surged late, up for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Pit Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied st, chased 6-5w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Little Demon
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, in hand 2p, ins turn, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Lastchanceatglory
ENTRY.OWNER: Winning Move Stable and DiSanto Brendon J
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w in aim, 2p turn, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, up, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Rocco Strong
ENTRY.OWNER: Britton Peak Wallshein Charles Caputo John Bell Roger and Toga Party Racing Stab
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 6F Inner turf CR: 84. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. INNER TURF FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred ). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTUALLY CORRECT showed speed on the inside of a foe, dropped off the pace near the five-eighths then switched to the outside, stalked the leader from that point, ranged up in the two path on the turn, took the lead while set down into upper stretch, kicked clear coming to the furlong marker and held under steady urging. SCHERZANDO settled off the pace, was taken in hand while off heels near the five-eighths, went around the turn in the two path, was roused while shifting four wide coming to the quarter-pole then was driven five wide into upper stretch, chased outside in the drive, gained in the final furlong and finished willingly for the place. FORWARD MOVE moved out early then settled on the outside, went three wide on the turn, was roused at the five-sixteenths, came four wide into upper stretch, chased the winner in the drive and was out-kicked while just able to get the show. LAUREL VALLEY settled off the pace, was taken in hand while moving in over the heels of a rival who came out in front near the five-eighths, saved ground on the turn, was roused while shifting three wide into upper stretch, chased the winner to the finish and lacked the needed kick then just missed the show. FROSTUITOUS dropped back while taken in hand early, settled at the rear, saved ground on the turn, had the rider lose his crop into upper stretch, moved out near the sixteenth-pole and failed to threaten. MISSION HILL settled on the outside, was roused three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and failed to rally. SHARPAZ went to the front then moved clear with five furlongs to run, vied inside on the turn, lost the lead under urging into upper stretch and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Scherzando
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,in hand off heels 5/8,2p turn,roused1/4,5w3/16,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Frostuitous
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Richard J Lugovich
ENTRY.COMMENT: drop back,settled at rear,ins,lost crop1/4,mvd out1/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Forward Move
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out,settled outside,3w,asked 5/16,4w3/16,out-kicked,earn3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Laurel Valley
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in over heels 5/8,rated,inside turn,shift 3w 3/16,miss3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Factually Correct
ENTRY.OWNER: Cotrone Robert Imperio Michael Gurdon Andrew O Rodriguez Rudy R Gabrielle Farm M
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed ins foe,switch out 5/8,2p turn,bid1/4,lead3/16,clr1/8,held

ENTRY.NAME: Sharpaz
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Koshanostra Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,pace,clear 5/8,inside turn,headed 3/16,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Mission Hill
ENTRY.OWNER: Cummings John P and Reinacher Jr Robert J
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,3wide turn,4wide into lane,no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 7F Turf CR: 84. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% AftercareA ssessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEW GINYA broke in striking the near side stall at the start and getting away last, saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out four to five wide into upper stretch, then closed well outside to get up in the final jumps to the finish. ROAD TO REMEMBER showed the way in hand along the inside patiently handled until set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under growing late threat and was caught in the final strides to the end. MASTEROF THE TUNES chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. HOWDYOUMAKEURMONEY chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. SILKEN DOLLAR chased just off the inside, got let out angled three wide into upper stretch, improved position to the wire. MOONAGE DAYDREAM chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. SHINFULL chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. DREAM CENTRAL chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued along the inside route into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Road to Remember
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, set down ins 1/4p, edged clear, dug in, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Howdyoumakeurmoney
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: New Ginya
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, up final jumps

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Central
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Shinfull
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Masterof the Tunes
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Silken Dollar
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, let out angled 3w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Moonage Daydream
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Dancin Renee S. BELMONT PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 105. Stakes Purse 125000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED NEW YORK STATE BRED REGISTRY. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $125 each which should acc ompany the nomination. $600 to pass the entry box and an additional $650 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $625 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. Thep urse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 124 lbs. Non-winners of a sweepstake in 2022-23 allowed 2 lbs.; of two races other tt han maiden, claiming, starter or state bred allowance in 2023 allowed 4 lbs.; of a race other than maiden, claiming, starter or state bred allowance in 2023 allowed 6 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, June 10, 2023 wi
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KANT HURRY LOVE stalked the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, chased the runner-up while outside in the stretch, gained on that foe in the final sixteenth and got up in the last stride to prevail. GRANNYS CONNECTION went to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, extended the advantage in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked once straightened for the drive, was put to a right-handed crop inside the furlong marker, led until the final stride but was denied while able to get the place. STERLING SILVER broke in and brushed with a foe, settled off the pace, was asked in the three path while between foes on the turn, chased in the two path in the stretch, gained in the final sixteenth and finished willingly for the show. BETSY BLUE was coaxed along on the outside, came under stronger encouragement in the four path on the turn, chased under a drive in the stretch and also finished willingly but just missed the show. CAPTAINSDAUGHTER settled at the rear of the field, lugged out some while kept to the inside under heavy left-rein pressure going around the turn, came out five wide into upper stretch and failed to rally. ROSSA VELOCE was hustled from the gate, dropped just off the pace, chased inside on the turn and came up empty. BANK ON ANNA brushed with a foe at the start, settled off the pace, was asked in the two path while between foes on the turn, dropped back into the stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Captainsdaughter
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled at rear,lugged out some rail turn,5p into upper,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Rossa Veloce
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well placed,chased inside turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Bank On Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,settled,asked 2p between foes turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Sterling Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,brshd,settled,asked 3p btwn turn,chased,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Grannys Connection
ENTRY.OWNER: Orpen Horses LLC Towell Jr Jack Hardin and Griffin Alan
ENTRY.COMMENT: went to front,dictated terms,2p,ask1/4,led to last stride,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Betsy Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed outside,roused 4wide turn,chased,gain late,missed3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Kant Hurry Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside,3path turn,chased,gained late,up final stride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. John M. McDermott & Laura G. McDermott

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 9 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 86. Claiming Purse 48000. INNER TURF (UP TO $8,352 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (1.5% Aftercare Asse ssment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BORN A GAMBLER got bumped at the start by the veering out ACAMAR, then had to briefly steady and alter slightly out as that foe continued outwards in front, took to the inside and chased the leader from mid pack, tipped to the two path into the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out five to six wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge inside the final furlong taking command a sixteenth from home, then edged away to the finish to prevail. MAURITIUS established the front as ACAMAR took most of the field on the scenic route at the start and spurted away showing the way just off the inside, tucked inside half a mile from home and had the field take closer order remaining unhurried and clinging to the front with five-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged away under a drive inside the eighth pole, dug in under threat from flanking challengers and was collared a sixteenth from home and was along safe to preserve the place honors. AMERICAN GRANT chased two to three wide down the backstretch, tucked inside half a mile from home and came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch before taking to the rail straightened away, then ran on to the finish to be along clear for the show honors. WATASHA got steadied after the start due to pressure from the veering out ACAMAR, chased three then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. MISTER ABARRIO got steadied after the start caught in the tangle early on by the veering out ACAMAR, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. LEGENDARY LORE chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the far turn under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. HIGH MOUNTE (IRE) got steadied at the start, chased three then four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went five wide into upper stretch, made no late headway. ADDICTED TO YOU got bumped at the start and was forced to check out from between foes due to pressure from ACAMAR, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the far turn coming under coaxing midway, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no kick. ACAMAR veered out at the start bumping BORN A GAMBLER into ADDICTED TO YOU and continued outwards in front of those foes forcing ADDICTED TO YOU to check out, two other rivals to steady out and then two additional rivals to steady out after the start, chased two to three wide in closest aim of the spurting away leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and tired. HIGH STRIKE four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Mauritius
ENTRY.COMMENT: spurted away 2p, to ins 1/2, 2w 1/4p, edged away, caught 1/16p

ENTRY.NAME: Acamar
